cmc.controller

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmc.controller.SearchController

  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchController handles communication with the UniversityDBLibrary and match sorting for CMC's search function.
    Version:
    4/1/16
    Author:
    Alex Seefeldt

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SearchController.SearchResult
      An ancillary class that allows Schools to be easily sorted by their scores.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[][] emphasisData
      The database output of emphasis data used by this SearchController when conducting a search.
      private java.lang.String[][] schoolData
      The database output of school data used by this SearchController when conducting a search.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchController()
      Constructs a new SearchController, pulling data from UniversityDBLibrary
      SearchController(java.lang.String[][] schoolData, java.lang.String[][] emphasisData)
      Constructs a new SearchController, taking its data from the given arrays.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private SearchController.SearchResult[] getResultList(SchoolSearchClause searchClause)
      Iterates through this SearchController's search data and constructs a list of SearchResults
      School[] search(SchoolSearchClause searchClause)
      Generates search results according to the given SchoolSearchClause, sorts them, and returns the resulting list of up to 50 Schools.

    • Field Detail

      • schoolData

        private java.lang.String[][] schoolData
        The database output of school data used by this SearchController when conducting a search.

      • emphasisData

        private java.lang.String[][] emphasisData
        The database output of emphasis data used by this SearchController when conducting a search.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchController

        public SearchController()
        Constructs a new SearchController, pulling data from UniversityDBLibrary

      • SearchController

        public SearchController(java.lang.String[][] schoolData,
                        java.lang.String[][] emphasisData)
        Constructs a new SearchController, taking its data from the given arrays. This constructor was used only in testing, to make testing against consistent database output possible.
        Parameters:
        schoolData - a 2-dimensional array simulating database output of school data
        emphasisData - a 2-dimensional array simulating database output of emphasis data

    • Method Detail

      • getResultList

        private SearchController.SearchResult[] getResultList(SchoolSearchClause searchClause)
        Iterates through this SearchController's search data and constructs a list of SearchResults
        Parameters:
        searchClause - the SchoolSearchClause used in this search
        Returns:
        an unsorted array of SearchResults

      • search

        public School[] search(SchoolSearchClause searchClause)
        Generates search results according to the given SchoolSearchClause, sorts them, and returns the resulting list of up to 50 Schools.
        Parameters:
        searchClause - the SchoolSearchClause used in this search
        Returns:
        a ranked array of Schools, with the best match appearing first
